actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony and direct the Senate Legal Counsel to provide representation in "United States v. Stephanie L. Roth, et. al."

summary.text: Authorizes the testimony of Senator John P. East and certain Senate employees, and directs the Senate legal counsel to represent such persons, in the case of United States v. Roth, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and direct the Senate Legal Counsel to provide representation in "United States v. Stephanie L. Roth, et. al."
